com.netflix.genie.client

Class ClusterServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
      • com.netflix.genie.client.ClusterServiceClient

  • public final class ClusterServiceClient
extends com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
    Singleton class, which acts as the client library for the Cluster Configuration Service.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
